text: 'Happy Mistakes' is the debut studio album by American pop rock group Heffron Drive. It was released on September 9, 2014 under Schmidt's own label TOLBooth Records. Heffron Drive consists of members Kendall Schmidt and Dustin Belt. title: Happy Mistakes
